text: 7:22 Jon 8:36; Galesia 5:13; Efesus 6:6; Filemon 1:16; 1 Pita 2:16Gumazim ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn itima, God an dia, ezɨ a datɨrɨghɨn Ekiamɨn gumazimra. An Ekiamɨn damazimɨn fɨriaghɨrɨgha, ua ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn mɨn itir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨra, gumazim fɨriaghɨrɨgha itima, God an diazɨ, a datɨrɨghɨn Kraisɨn ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn mɨn iti.
